name: rohlik-enhanced
description: Browser extension to display nutri-scores for grocery products

scripts.package:firefox: cp manifest.firefox.json manifest.json && zip -r ../rohlik-enhanced-firefox.zip * -x "*.DS_Store" && rm manifest.json
scripts.package:chrome: cp manifest.chrome.json manifest.json && zip -r ../rohlik-enhanced-chrome.zip * -x "*.DS_Store" && rm manifest.json
scripts.package:all: npm run package:firefox && npm run package:chrome
